title: Shenandoah National Park: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes               Fees & Passes       Entrance Fees  Jump to: Fee Free Days Entrance Fees Annual/Lifetime Passes Academic Fee Waiver   For information on how Shenandoah uses money collected through fees,  click here.           Fee Type  Fee    Shenandoah Annual Pass  Unlimited entry for one year to pass owner and passengers in same vehicle.     $40    Shenandoah Single Vehicle Fee  Unlimited entry for one vehicle and passengers for seven consecutive days. Vehicles must be private, noncommercial, and with a seating capacity of 15 or less.   $20     Shenandoah "Per Person" Fee  Walk-up or single bicycle fee. Unlimited entry for seven consecutive days.   $10     Shenandoah Motorcycle Fee  Unlimited entry for one motorcycle and passenger for seven consecutive days.    $15    Campground Fees-Camping Information  Per site, nightly fee.    $15-$20
